name: Run Senzero 3D Endless Runner
description:
Check Out my 3D Endless Runner Game its my First Game

i am from Ethiopia and trying to Learning Game Development

what do you think about my Game ??

Give me a comment and if you like you can support me by Donating what you like it means a lot

the Game simple you can change direction by swiping to left or to right

and for The Jump and slide you can swipe to Up and Down

you will Get a daily reward of coins

and you can by cloths shoes Hats and Hairs with Your Coin you can get coin by clicking in shop window the plus sign with a rewarded ad 
you can also revive the player with rewarded video

Thanks so much

From BinaryAbyssinia - ICaleb
